original_text: He made horns for it on its four corners. Its horns were of one piece with it, and he overlaid it with bronze.
korean_text: 그 네 모퉁이 위에 그 뿔을 만들되 그 뿔을 제단과 연결하게 하고 제단을 놋으로 쌌으며

sentences.original_text: He made horns for it on its four corners.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것의 네 귀퉁이에 뿔을 만들었다.

sentences.original_text: Its horns were of one piece with it
sentences.korean_translation: 그 뿔들은 그것과 한 몸으로 만들어졌다.

sentences.original_text: and he overlaid it with bronze.
